application.doc: Retrieving the details for a particular federated directory

param.name: directory_name
param.doc: The federated directory name. Special characters must be URI encoded.

method.name: GET
method.id: Retrieving the details for a particular federated directory
method.doc: To retrieve the details of a particular federated directory, issue an HTTP GET command on the federated directory resource URI.

param.name: id
param.doc: The identifier for the federated directory.

param.name: port
param.doc: The port used to communicate with the directory

param.name: bind_dn
param.doc: The dn used to authenticate with the directory. May be "anonymous" for anonymous LDAP bind.

param.name: use_ssl
param.doc: Whether or not SSL is used to communicate with the directory.

param.name: client_cert_label
param.doc: The client certificate to use when communicating with the directory using SSL.

param.name: suffix
param.doc: A json array representing the suffixes that are configured for this directory.
